Santa Maria da Boca do Monte, January 30, 1841

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio

Lieutenant Colonel Manuel Lucas de Oliveira, who is on the march with the brigade under his command to the municipality of Piratini; and who will be on this side of the Picada tomorrow or the day after, has recommended that I ask Your Excellency, General-in-Chief, to demand it from Your Excellency.

I take this occasion to greet Your Excellency

I remain with esteem and consideration of Your Excellency  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Nota bene Leite. I am proceeding to Piratini and it is necessary for me to travel by this side for greater security.
